bring select columns to the front of a dataframe

bring select columns to the front of a dataframe

bring_to_front(.df, ...)

Arguments

...
columns to bring to front
df
dataframe

Examples

Theoph %>% bring_to_front(conc, Time)
#>      conc  Time Subject   Wt Dose
